attributes.action: create an opt-in newsletter listing new petitions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Allow people to opt-in to an E-petitions newsletter sent weekly (or monthly) to anyone who wants to know what new petitions have been raised.
People can then click on a link to any petition they would like to vote for on the E-petitions website.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
